name: Joseph P. GUARRASI, J.D., Appellant v. Thomas Gary GAMBARDELLA, D.J. District Magistrate, 7-3-01 Individual and Official Capacity and Diane E. Gibbons, J., Common Pleas Court Judge Individual and Official Capacity, Appellees

parties: Joseph P. GUARRASI, J.D., Appellant v. Thomas Gary GAMBARDELLA, D.J. District Magistrate, 7-3-01 Individual and Official Capacity and Diane E. Gibbons, J., Common Pleas Court Judge Individual and Official Capacity, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of May, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED. The Application for Leave to Amend Appellees’ Brief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
115 A.3d 309
Joseph P. GUARRASI, J.D., Appellant v. Thomas Gary GAMBARDELLA, D.J. District Magistrate, 7-3-01 Individual and Official Capacity and Diane E. Gibbons, J., Common Pleas Court Judge Individual and Official Capacity, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 26, 2015.
